actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Food and Agriculture Act of 1977 to require that for purposes of making assistance available under the emergency feed program, the Secretary of Agriculture consider the nutritive value and suitability of feed available for particular types of livestock and poultry.

summary.text: Amends the Food and Agriculture Act of 1977 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to consider the nutritive value and suitability of available feed for purposes of emergency livestock feed assistance.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food and Agriculture Act of 1977 to require that for purposes of making assistance available under the emergency feed program, the Secretary of Agriculture consider the nutritive value and suitability of feed available for particular types of livestock and poultry.
